data.md:MetaData: Growth rate of Dolioletta gegenbauri and Thalia democratica determined experimentally
exact geograpical position estimated from literature, cylinder-cone = 3 m long, made of either 110 µm of 202 µm nylon mesh, mesh-to-mouth = 8:1
Laboratory determined mortality, fecundity and growth rates of Thalia democratica Forskal and Dolioletta gegenbauri Uljanin (Tunicata, Thaliacea)
